name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior DevOps Engineer with 10+ years of experience in delivering high-performance software solutions and adept at managing cloud infrastructure and automation. Proficient in **GCP**, **Kubernetes**, **Docker**, **Terraform**, **Jenkins**, **Bash**, and **Python**, specializing in CI/CD processes, incident management, and monitoring with tools like **Grafana** and **Google Cloud Monitoring**. Experienced in deploying applications on cloud-native platforms and skilled in database technologies including **PostgreSQL**, **Mongo**, and **Redis**. 
A strong advocate of Agile methodologies, with a proven track record of driving high-impact projects that enhance operational efficiencies and reliability in dynamic environments. Previously led initiatives that integrated best practices in DevOps and established automation frameworks to optimize deployment pipelines and ensure compliance with industry standards. Passionate about leveraging technology to create systems that deliver measurable business value.

experience.responsibilities:
• Implemented enterprise-level DevOps pipelines using **Jenkins**, **GitHub Actions**, and **Azure DevOps**, ensuring efficient CI/CD across multiple environments while incorporating security scans and automated testing.
• Managed containerized applications by utilizing **Docker** and **Kubernetes** to orchestrate scalable deployments, enhancing system reliability and performance.
• Designed and optimized cloud infrastructure on **GCP** leveraging **Terraform** for infrastructure as code, facilitating seamless resource provisioning and management.
• Developed and maintained monitoring and logging solutions with **Google Cloud Monitoring** and **Grafana**, ensuring high visibility into application performance and system health across **Kubernetes** clusters.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams in an **Agile** environment to drive incident management processes, significantly reducing downtime and improving system resiliency.
• Conducted regular audits of database solutions utilizing **PostgreSQL**, **Mongo**, and **Redis** to identify performance enhancements and optimize data querying for business-critical applications, serving over **10,000** concurrent users.
• Implemented automated backups and recovery plans for databases, enhancing data integrity and availability by **99.9%** uptime.
• Utilized **Bash** scripting to automate routine tasks, reducing manual effort and increasing operational efficiency by **30%**.
• Led the adoption of Infrastructure as Code (IaC) principles using **Terraform**, improving deployment speed by **40%** and reducing configuration drift across environments.

Utilized **GCP** and **Kubernetes** to deploy and manage containerized applications, ensuring CI/CD pipelines for efficient code delivery using **Jenkins** and **Terraform**, achieving a deployment frequency of **20+ times a week**.
Implemented orchestration and provisioning of containerized applications via **Docker**, enhancing development productivity and system reliability.
Developed and maintained automated scripts using **Bash** for system monitoring and incident management, significantly reducing downtime by **30%**.
Integrated **Grafana** and **Google Cloud Monitoring** to establish comprehensive monitoring systems, enabling real-time performance tracking and incident response for multiple environments, effectively managing over **50 applications**.
Optimized databases using **PostgreSQL** and **MongoDB** for improved data retrieval and storage efficiency, resulting in a **40% decrease** in query response times.
Enhanced caching strategies using **Redis** to boost application performance, leading to an **average load time improvement of 25%** across services.
Collaborated in an **Agile** environment to foster continuous improvement and swift incident resolution, contributing to a team that managed the operations of high-impact applications seamlessly.
Led the creation of incident management workflows to quickly address and resolve critical issues, maintaining excellent service availability and user satisfaction.

Implemented and optimized CI/CD pipelines using **Jenkins** and **Docker**, enhancing deployment speed by **40%** and ensuring consistent build environments.
Managed infrastructure as code with **Terraform**, provisioning and maintaining scalable cloud resources on **GCP** to support a global e-commerce platform.
Utilized **Kubernetes** for orchestration, ensuring high availability and efficient resource management for microservices deployed across **Google Cloud**.
Developed automation scripts in **Bash** for system administration tasks, reducing manual intervention and improving operational efficiency by **25%**.
Monitored system performance and availability with **Grafana** and **Google Cloud Monitoring**, achieving an incident resolution time under **5 minutes** through effective alerting strategies.
Facilitated incident management processes, collaborating with cross-functional teams to troubleshoot and resolve issues, ensuring minimal downtime and optimal system performance.
Leveraged **PostgreSQL**, **MongoDB**, and **Redis** for data management, implementing backup strategies that ensured data integrity and availability in case of failures.
Adopted Agile methodologies to streamline development and operations, enhancing team collaboration and accelerating project delivery timelines.
Designed and enforced role-based access control (RBAC) policies, ensuring secure access to resources while maintaining compliance with GDPR regulations.
